summary: Are you tired of chaos in your weapon\'s tab in invetory due to different arrow types scattered all over? This simple mode aims to solve the problem.
descriptionHtml:
==Description==
There are many arrow types in skyrim - Iron Arrow, Ebony Arrow etc. Because of their unfortunate naming they appear in your inventory (which is sorted alphabetically) on different places. So I just changed their names so all of them starts with \"Arrow\" keeping them nicely on one place. This is a really simple modification but I believe it can be helpful nonetheless. 

==Installation==
Simply put the .esp file into \"Data\" folder and then check it in game launcher or use the Nexus Mod Manager.

==Rights==
You can do whatever you want with this mod
author: Khanemis
